metadata.title: Stop Breaking Down Blues

xml.lyrics:
Every time I'm walking down the street, some pretty mama start breakin' down on me
Stop breaking down, baby please stop breakin' down
The stuff I got'll bust your brains out baby, ooh, it make you lose your mind
I got my baby ninety nine degree, she took my baby throwed a pistol down on me
Stop breaking down, baby please stop breaking down
The stuff I got'll bust your brains out baby, ooh, make you lose your mind
I can't stop walkin' down the street, but some pretty mama breakin' down on me
Stop breakin' down, baby please stop breakin' down
Yes, you know the stuff I got'll bust your brains out baby, make you lose your mind
Stuff'll bust your brains out baby, make you lose your mind
Oh yeah
